short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Useful extension to speed up videos on websites. Won't help you learn any faster but hey atleast it'll be over quicker lol.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Super simple extension to speed up / slow any video elements on any given site.

0.5.0 Update:
+ Popup notifications have been added to alert speed changes / errors.

0.3.0 Update: 
+ Shortcuts have been added. 
- Use the '`' key in combination with 1, 2, 3, 4, or 5 to change the speed of a video to pre-set speeds.
- Use the '`' key in combination with the '+' or '-' to change the speed of a video by 0.25 either way. 
+ Better element validation has been added.
